com.ipt.ebsa.manage.environment

Interface EnvironmentStateManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HieraEnvironmentStateManager, MCOEnvironmentStateManager, TestEnvironmentStateManager

    public interface EnvironmentStateManager
    The interface for a class which manages Environment State
